Text:
Anybody who wants the original Tutorial of Imperium III that is missing from this torrent can download it from here: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7489817/Imperium_III_Standard_Tutorial___Spanish_Mod
the name is "Imperium III Standard Tutorial + Spanish Mod", if you want you can except from downloading the spanish mod that the torrent includes.

There is a second updated reupload, you better choose this: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7529505
"Imperium III - Great Battles of Rome - English Translation PC !2ndReUp!"
